shortDescription: SQL injection vulnerability in the Statistics (ke_stats) extension before 1.1.2 for TYPO3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors, as exploited in the wild in February 2014.
vulnerabilityName: kennziffer statistics Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
